code: import{BaseApi}from'./BaseService';var API_URL="/api/lophoc";var layDanhSachLopService=function layDanhSachLopService(){return BaseApi.get(API_URL+"/lay-danh-sach-lop-and-check-road-map");};var layDanhSachChiNhanhService=function layDanhSachChiNhanhService(){return BaseApi.get("/api/chinhanh");};var capNhatLopHocService=function capNhatLopHocService(model){return BaseApi.put("".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(model.id),model);};var layBaiTapDaCham=function layBaiTapDaCham(){return BaseApi.get("/api/buoihoc/get-bai-tap-chua-cham");};export var LopHocService={layDanhSachLopService:layDanhSachLopService,layDanhSachChiNhanhService:layDanhSachChiNhanhService,capNhatLopHocService:capNhatLopHocService,layBaiTapDaCham:layBaiTapDaCham};
